values:
1. Name: Maegan
2. Single or Taken: Not that i know of....but possibly
3. Sex: Female
4. Siblings: two older step bros, younger sister.....two bros from high school, three sisters from growing up...
5. Eye color: Hazel....green,yellow,sometimes blue
6. Shoe size: 7 1/2

15. Best place to go for a date? ill be happy to just be with someone...
----------------------------------------------------------------

4. Girls Name: jenn
5. Animal: cows...monkeys....FROGS

Have You Ever..

1. Given anyone a bath? i babysit.....if that doesnt count then no.
3. Bungee Jump? i want to, will u take me?

20. Cried in school: once or twice
21. Fell off your chair: does it count if someone pulls it out from under u? JASON!!!!
22. Sat by the phone all night waiting for someone to call?: even though i have my phone on me most of the time, i have sat around wanting and waiting for it to ring....
23. Saved AIM convos: computer does it anyways...
24. Saved e-mails: some
25. Made out with/kissed just a friend?: i have.....
26. Used someone: y would i use someone?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
What is...

1. Your good luck charm?: i dont think i have one
2. Best song you ever heard: ...."she will be loved".....maroon 5
3. What's your room like: its semi clean, i just got back in from flying home for the weekend...
4. What is beside you?: a wall.....my bed
5. The last thing you ate: wings

3. Like school: sometimes

Questions:

Who?::

Questions:

2. What did you do yesterday?: stayed out til 4 am then went to sleep for four hours, then got on a plane to fly back to NC got stuck in Alt. for four hours then came home and entertained a friend for a little til i unwillingly and unknowingly fell asleep.

4. What car do you wish to have: anything that works...
5. Where do you want to get married: dont know havent thought about it
6. Good driver?: yupper
7. Good singer?: depends 
8. Have a lava lamp? yupper and its on and bubbling now!!!

10. What do you dream about?: i dont know...i do but wont tell
11. When did u last take a shower? earlyer

13. chocolate or vanilla: Strawberry
14. Rootbeer or Dr.Pepper: rootbeer
15. Skiing or snowboarding: done neither :(

17. Silver or Gold?: Silver
18. Sprite or 7up: Sprite
19. Coffee or tea: Tea
20. Phone or in person: ill be happy with a phone call, would love to be in person.
21. Are you oldest, middle, or youngest?: was oldest, then became the second youngest
22: Indoors or Outdoors?: hands down....outdoors
23. Diamond or pearl: anything pretty
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Talk to someone you liked: amazingly yes! :)
2. Bought something: does food count?
3. Get sick: nope
4. Sang: maybe? cant remember if it was today or yesterday?
5. Talked to an ex: ha right no...
6. Miss someone: yupper....i miss alot of ppl

1. Was in your bed: lexi....
2. Saw you cry: lexi
3. Made you cry: billy
4. Went to the movies with: ha, Bobby,Justin,Nikki,Geri,Sam,Danny,
5. You went to the mall with: Lexi,Keith
6. Said "I Love You" and meant it: jenn (my best friend)
7. You hugged: Lexi....Keith....Bobby,Justin....is there a time limit, cause if not then about a zillion ppl in the past weekend....Mostly Bobby though.:)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2. Been to California: yes
3. Been to Mexico: yes
4. Been to Canada: No,an hour away
5. Been to Europe: want to someday
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Random.....

1. Do you have a crush on someone: yes
2. What book are you reading now?: none amazionly
3. Best feeling in the world: getting a real hug and hearing im missed
4. Future KIDS names: dont know havent thought about it...
5. Do you sleep with a stuffed animal: i have a dog, two frogs, and a bear on my bed....cows on my desk and random stuff on a shelf....i think that answers this...lol
6. Whats under your bed: boxes,books,movies,shoes,blankets,random stuff 
7. Favorite sports to watch:football,soccer,baseball
8. Piercing/Tattoos: ears are pierced thats it.
9. What are you scared of: being alone
10. Who do you really hate: when people dont follow through with what they say
11. Have you ever liked someone you didn't have a chance with: yupp,im human
12. Have you ever cried: yes i have
13. Are you lonely right now: nope, my room mate is here and i have a feeling keith is coming over later....but i know im loved and cared for so i dont have to feel lonely.
14. Song that's stuck in your head right now: "She will be loved"
16. Have you ever gotten beat up: with pillows.....it sucked,but fun
17. Have you ever been on radio/TV: once
18. ever been in a mosh pit? thanks to Karen and Becca,yes
19. Ever liked someone but thought they never noticed you?: ha,they noticed me, but i didnt know they noticed in a more than friend matter....
20. Last person you talked to on the phone?: bobby :)
21. Your Favorite Food?: Tacos
22. Hugs or Kisses?: hugs, but if we're together.....kisses
23. Butter, Plain, or Salty: Salty
24. Cats or Dogs: Both
25. Have you ever fired a gun?: yupper
26. How many pillows do you sleep with: the more the happier
27. Who are you missing right now?: Bobby....
28. Who do you think is beautiful?: everyone
29. Do you think your ex misses you?: nope

Yay Another!
our senior year in High School is supposed to be "the y: best year of your life." Let's see how much you remember. I know for some it might be hard for you to go back that far!

Year: 2005
1. Who was your best friend?
becca,karen,justin,bobby,jenn
2. What sports did you play?
i was a drama nerd
3. What kind of car did you drive?
92 trasus
4. It's Friday night, where were you?
gameworks,mall,at home,at friends house,or working
5. Were you a party animal?
nope
6. Were you in the "In Crowd"?
sometimes
7. Ever skip school?
once
8. Ever smoke?
nope
9. Were you a nerd?does drama count?
10. Did you get suspended/expelled?
Nope
11. Can you sing the alma mater?
whats that?
12. Who was your favorite teacher?
Mrs. Lashbrook
13. Favorite class?
peer counseling
14. What was your schools full name?
Cooper City High School
15. School mascot?
Cowboy
16. Did you go to Prom?
Yes i did
17. If you could go back and do it over, would you?
probably
18. What do you remember most about graduation?
goofying off with my friends
19. Favorite memory of your Senior Year?
being with friends and enjoying my self
20. Were you ever posted up on the senior wall?
No
21. Did you have a job your senior year?
yupper
22. Where did you go most often for lunch?out side with friends
23. What did you do after graduation?
out wiht family for dinner

hey sorry i havent written. been on facebook and busy with school and sick. thanks karen to sending me an e-mail telling me to write. im  listening to u and writing. hope all is well and talk to u later

having a good time at school.....more than i want to work but getting things done here and there. i am now working three jobs and im about to pick up a class tomorrow and drop two the 13th of october. cant wait. but now i have to be up at 7:30 more or less every day instead of 9 or 10 dang man im going to lose my sleep. well other than that trying to keep in touch with different people through different things....face book, aim,lj,two e-mails. phone. different things and not enough time to be on all at the same time. anyways just wanted to say hi and up date. bye for now

megs

im feeling very left out, i dont feel any love... boo hooo. u bums. ( starts to cry) anyways seeing that i just talked to u guys like today or last night i dont have much to up date u with. oh im sick if that counts. not really bad just soar and stuffy nose. drinking water and gatorade and taking sudafed. thinking whether or not to run to walmart to get nyquill. hmm maybe tonight to tried now. anyways congrates on becca's boyfriend.....karen want to send me a twin of yours? hehehe maybe not. ill have to wait and see if i can get on to facebook or not ill check my e-mail tomorrow to see. anyways just thought to write something in here before i left and went back to bed. stay safe and dont get killed or drunk......BECCA THATS MOSTLY FOR U.... much love to u and even more miss u and hugs . bye for now


meg

i miss u guys so much and im so happy that we got to talk last night. i really miss talking and hanging out with u. u have no idea. i talked to dad this morning, he;s going to go online tonight to check for a plane ticket for me so ill let u know when i find out. thanks again and i hope to talk to u again, ill be on line again at 10 hope to talk to u or ill call u and make u go on line....hint hint get on line....hint hint....anyways thanks again and ill talk to u tonight. bye byes


bilbo always and forever....



AND YES KAREN I AM THE YOUNGEST AND PROUD OF IT......!!!!!!


megs

im not sure how i did on my test yet, when i find out ill let u know. i should find out with in tomorrow or the next days or who knows ill find out next week. grr if i have to wait longer. i am doing good other wise. im keeping up with my work. and im still waiting on hearing back from the what is new back home.....hint hint....karen/becca....hint hint. hey im also wait for any new CDs beccas. im dieing to hear what new u have.lol. anyways im going i have to be up at 10 and in my english teachers office at 10....wait that means ill be up earlyer....dang it man. anyways i hope to hear what new is going on. please get on when ur not so busy i miss talking to u all. we are going to have to hang out when we can....ill be home the weekend of aug 6 or 7 through aug 17. i have to be up here the 19 of aug be.c thats when i have to be on campus. anyways im going now. bye all and hope to hear from u. bye for now


meg

hey everyone just thought to let u know whats up im taking a test tomorrow. anyways hanging out meeting with new friends and dieing for some real food man....i cant wait to get home then i can eat some and sleep, please i could sleep the day away.....i have to get up at 7 in the morning and be up til at least 11 at ngiht depending on how late i study and whats going on.....lol. anyways i havent heard from anyone back there so i have not a clue whats going on.....can someone please inform me or am i not loved enough for that......lol. please....becca.....someone....oh beccas ill be home the 6 or 7 ask dad. so when i get back, we're r so doing that movie night.....i miss watching movies...i want to go and see Charley and the chococolate factory....hopefully soon like thursday or so.....did u see it let me know. anyays im going bye for now

meg

college is getting to me. soooo much writing to do.....really i have to do a journal everyday for english and here and there for music, and a log for health....ahhhh. other than that im good. hanging out and keeping busy, working out and having fun and not much partying for me but i cant say the same for others. lol. but its good for me be.c their going to get into trouble for under age drinking and drinking on campus. hehe sorry i cant be mean but its kinda funny at the same time. i went to a Ponche Sanduze thing concert last night. it was a jazz band thing. they ended the concert with salsa and cha cha and the watermelon man and stuf. it was good. umm im to be home the 6th or 7th of Aug. not sure yet. im planning on selling my car, hint hint, i can get about $2,000 for it....so if i can ill sell it for that....hint hint. pass the word around. im getting four new tires. umm nothing else really going on. hope to hear from u all soon. bye for now

meg


P.S. 
if u want to write me

maegan stone
Lenior rhyne college box 8510
hickory nc 28603

hey there i know i havent talked in like forever so heres whats going on. Im at college in Hickory N.C. ill be here til the 5 of Aug then im flying home for two weeks then ill be here again the 17 or 18 of Aug for the fall term. doing good so far, today is the first day so ill let u know how it goes. cant believe im really away from home and really loveing it so far. i like my room mate so far shes cool. shes in to basket ball and shes really quite out side of the room and all. ha ha no.... umm becca to u im talking .....umm Chris and i r no longer talking  we're not friends nor bf/gf. its totally over so i guess that ur jumping for joy.... :( have fun i guess.    anyways ill talk to u all later if i get a chance. if u want to talk u can call after 9 or ill try to be on line about then as well. bye for now talk to u all later.


meg

im sorry i havent updated in a while i havent really been up to writing much..... and not much to write about that would interest u ppl. anyways. one and a half days left of school............shut up becca lol.............cant wait to be free of school. umm im going to Lenior Rhyne in North Carolina. my first class is July 5 so im leaving early for school. hehehe sorry for those that will miss me. ill miss u very much. ummm jarad, if u still read this. im mad at u i was trying to be friendly to u and say hi....a little of trying to scare u as well.....but u didnt have to be rude about it... u could have said hi then i got to work talk to u later or something. anyways just thought to let u know. anyways ill talk to u all later. bye for now


meg

well, umm im shocked, i dont know what to say.... lol. i havent written in what a month or two? long long time, sorry about it. i know u ppl get a good time out of it....hehe anywho bored as ever but keeping very busy. school in april.....u all have to come IM IN IT... well hey is what has been going on. busy with school, keeping grades up hanging with friends, working not making money. rehearsals set construction. trying to not hate a certain family or two and try to be with friends on the side. umm going to church in between and still have time for homework....hehehe well i think thats it happy valentines... bye for now


meg

well heres the update for what the past four weeks? yea its been that long and theres lots that have happened.
Chris and i have been dating since the sunday after chrismas if some of u havent heard.....its going ok, im still wishing for better, its not us but his mom. The browns knew that we liked each other and didnt want a relationship to form so they slowly started to keep us apart.....and tell his parents something i didnt want known.......i me being "highly" flirtious.....yea yea yea some cant see me as that but some one did see me as that and well at the time i was told ".... i cant even say hi to a guy with out flirting...." i was having self doubt so i had to believe them.....and thats when i flirted at halloween and "gave a bad impression" and realized i like chris and then the browns knew we liked each other and thought to try to keep a relationship from happening.....haha didnt work nice try.....shh dont tell them i said that.... well i went away after new years and found after i was away that all of a sudden his mom didnt want him to see me anymore.....well then later the day i was to be coming home, mrs brown called we had our chat and it ended bad.....really bad..... she called me ungodly and stuff and well.....u know my dad ud agree to the next of this......he called her up left a message then got a call from mr and we all chatted at church......again for another week i didnt se chris be/c he didnt want to go to church just to see me so another week.....now 2 have gone by since we last saw each other....... went by with out seeing him problems be/c browns and me ok but not all the way gone....."dating leads to marriage...." brother give me a break.....finally i do get to see chris another week later his meet at school. found out that im a "blessing" to him... and tbhat he never seems to stop talking about me....in a good way.... lots of ppl introducing them selfs to me just to say hi and  that they met me....embrassed when his coach had to announce i was there and then the guys shared and started over to me....lol.....hong with his best friends family....really cool ppl....and met his older brothers and ones girlfriend and her son.....then went for food and had a blast.....went home to find chris's mom knew i was there........y o y o y she doesnt hate me.....just doesnt want me to be a distraction.....hmmm am i a distraction? hmm flirtious, brat, stoner, now distraction.......anything else anyone want to add to the list?!?!?!?!?  schools better....hehehe....i had the choir for "bye bye birdy" hehehe and set constr. and movement of the set and choir and im also going to try out for "nancy" one of the girls in the song....it has a little bit of a solo....short though...staying out of the house, not making money but enjoying the time at school from 7 on the morning till about 9 at night.....its different for different days..... monday was none tuesday i was back at school from 6-9 wedns none and thursday 7-5 got food back again at 5:45 till 9:10 and tomorrow 7-2:30 back at 6.....fun 6-9 heheheh la la la la.   oh and jason is coming down tomorrow too he'll be here for the weekend.....ok i think this is enough to last a few more days....lol. ill try to get back on when i can....bye for now mis u all. night night

hey everyone, hows it going? doing good here..... xmas was good got a few things. car is doing ok, could be better. hopeing to hang with friends some more over the break...hint hint... been hanging with some old friends, might have to go to port st lucy next week maybe tuesday after work, found out my nana's mom died, and my aunt and cuz r coming into town so i want to hang with them. ill call tomorrow and c if its possible. well going to go talk to u later....

my friend is having major problems, she doesnt like me she wants someone else.......what can i do to help her....i take care of her and wash her and "feed" her....but she hates me.......i need a new friend some one that will love me and not hurt me........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................i need a new car.....  :(

well i got some things for chrismas......but not all of the stuff i need. still got to get more stuff. yes becca and karen i still have to get u ur gifts, but ill get them sooner or later. maybe after the chrismas deal but i promise ull get them. becca, i got the purse, well not the green one but tan and its pretty, geri got it for me for chrismas.....hehehe.....i love it. i got her the wallet she wanted.....so it works out. hehehe i also got chris and lucchi something but i still need to get mom and dad something......any ideas? im at a lost cant think of anything, i might just get dad a gift card at home depot but i think i should get him something more and i might just go to a art store and get mom something.....boring......well ill talk to u ppls later.......oh bad news i have to bring my car to the shop again...boo hoo.....jenn and geri and i were going out the get something to eat before we went shopping and my car was smoking really bad, i came home and we ended up taking jenns car, i have to be at school late on monday so that means ill out in half an hour at work then bring my car to the shop after that just to find out whats wrong.....my poor poor car, it might just be the water pump but it could be more and im afrid that it is more..... I NEED A NEW CAR.......   :(

i realized this past week that no matter how much i care for ppl, i will always get slaped in the face for it. other than becca,karen,jarad,kelly,my other friends dont care about me. i could call here and there once in a blue moon and when i dont call for a while they dont seem to notice that they havent talked to me, i didnt call one friend for over 2 months, not be/c i didnt want to i was just too busy to call, sorry to them. but after those two month i finally call on geri's behalf be/c she wanted to have more friends to go out with at 11:30 at night, but noooo not after soo much time of not talking or hanging, nope they werent even glad to see me, but worst, it was as if i had killed the day....night.... does anyone out there really care if i call them or not???

well Monday was good went fast, tuesday the same.....now wednesday and thrusday and friday and saturday r different.....wednesday i had my first audition for "Bye Bye Birdy" with school. then i had to go to church for a school there which i ended up leaving and not seeing. then thursday i went to my second audition and that went good, then friday the third and last then went home for an hour or less before i had to be back at church and had a rehearsal till like 10 and tomorrow i have to be back at church at 2 for more rehearsals and then the show at 7 sounds soo much like fun....lol.....im going insane but still having fun......

i have two things going at once. school play..... three days of straight three hours of auditions and then two more days of rehearsals for the christmas show at my church.....im soo tried....and sooo much math homework its driving me insane. at my audition today i totally screwed up the song. we had to learn the dance and then one by one we went in to sing and the girl came to get me from out side i ran in sat down for literally 5 seconds before i was pushed in the door then laughed as i sang the short song. it was the worst thing in the world im going to see if i can possibly.....i really hope....to redo it.... please oh please. ahh boy how much i need to repractice plus practice the dance and stuff and ill be there again from 3 to 6 and the same for friday and then friday ngiht at 7 i have rehearsal from 7 to goodness knows when and then karen, arent u coming back down? shoot if u r i have to get a hold of dave for ur ticket.....r u? would ur mom want to come too.....its $15 chicken or beef? ahhh i've gone insane!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

-THIS JOURNAL IS CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION-
IGNORE ANY WEIRDNESS OR SUCH AS karen IS TOO TIRED TO COMPLETELY FINISH THIS JOURNAL RIGHT NOW

i have been reading everybodies journals just to kinda get an idea what everyone is writing and what i should write about. and i find that basicly everyone talks.....i take that back, writes.......what ever is on their mind. i dont think i could go that far into telling the world what im thinking so ill get a little personal, but not too much. ill more than likely keep it basic but ill try to let u know what im thinking otherwise, i just dont want someone to get hurt by what i say and then use it against me....... karen i did have a really fun weekend and same to u becca but i found something different. after five or six long months of feeling odd and alone, nothing against u becca.....i know who myreal friends r be;.c with them i do feel wanted and cared about......Mike u can relate to what im talking about. No one has ever been told.....ok i take that back two ppl have been told.....how i felt but i found that after karen left and becca started to get involved with other things, i felt like i could just drop off the face of the earth and no one would notice.......but then i met Jenn when i started to work and shes like me basicly. and through each other we found that we r wanted and needed and cared for. shut up i know what ur thinking but its not. i just found that i can be happy when no one calls me and when i dont get invited out and when im home on a friday and or saturday night when others r out i know what somewhere someone is thinking of me and soon the clock with ring and the phone will be for me and someone wants to spend the lost time with me..........wow how good does that feel to say...write....that all out and let it be said. it sounds odd but if karen doesnt come down for the next five months i know its not be.c of me but be.c of transportation and if becca goes and does her own thing i know its not be.c of me but be.c she has other friends and the same for jarad and kelly and my new friend mike and if jenn goes same with her. i can handle it when friends dont call and stuff....ill get over it and ill call once in a while but im not going to let my self feel like its my fault that they dont invite me out......who knows this could be all B.S. and it is my fault they dont call.........is it or isnt it?
hey all. new to this but have lots of friends being helpful and well basicly doing alot to help me out.....really there doing it for me.....but im writing......hehehe.
Hi everybody, this is my new LJ!! Yay!!! I have finally joined the normal world!! ^^
